description: Designates the query finder. Must be 'analytics' for the Analytics Finder.

Pivot of results grouping each report data point. Supported enum values include COMPANY, ACCOUNT, SHARE, CAMPAIGN, CREATIVE, CAMPAIGN_GROUP, CONVERSION, CONVERSATION_NODE, CONVERSATION_NODE_OPTION_INDEX, SERVING_LOCATION, CARD_INDEX, MEMBER_COMPANY_SIZE, MEMBER_INDUSTRY, MEMBER_SENIORITY, MEMBER_JOB_TITLE, MEMBER_JOB_FUNCTION, MEMBER_COUNTRY_V2, MEMBER_REGION_V2, MEMBER_COMPANY, PLACEMENT_NAME, IMPRESSION_DEVICE_TYPE, EVENT_STAGE.
Inclusive start time range of the analytics. If unset, it indicates an open range up to the end time.
Inclusive end time range of the analytics. Must be after start time if present. If unset, indicates open range from start to all future times.
Time granularity of results. Enum values: ALL, DAILY, MONTHLY, YEARLY.
Filter results by campaign type. Supported: TEXT_AD, SPONSORED_UPDATES, SPONSORED_INMAILS, DYNAMIC. Requires at least one other facet.
Filter by share facets. Defaults to empty. Required unless another facet is provided.
Filter by campaign facets. Defaults to empty. Required unless another facet is provided.
Filter by campaign group facets. Defaults to empty. Required unless another facet is provided.
Filter by sponsored ad account facets. Defaults to empty. Required unless another facet is provided.
Filter by advertiserâ€™s own company facets. Defaults to empty. Required unless another facet is provided.
Field by which results are sorted. Supported: COST_IN_LOCAL_CURRENCY, IMPRESSIONS, CLICKS, ONE_CLICK_LEADS, OPENS, SENDS, EXTERNAL_WEBSITE_CONVERSIONS.
Order of sorting. Supported: ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
List of metric fields to fetch. Refer to supported metrics in the metrics schema.
